props.name: leadingVisual
props.description: A function that renders a component before the token text

props.name: text
props.description: The text label inside the token

props.name: onRemove
props.description: The function that gets called when a user clicks the remove button, or keys `Backspace` or `Delete` when focused on the token

props.name: hideRemoveButton
props.description: Whether the remove button should be rendered in the token

props.name: id
props.description: A unique identifier that can be associated with the token

props.name: size
props.description: Which size the token will be rendered at

props.description: The color that corresponds to the label
